participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and reflective, she enjoys nature and values hard work.
participant_1.background: Sometimes I think I should get out and exercise more. I work 60 hours a week. I love sunsets. I wake early to watch the sun rise every day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, he is eager to learn and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I currently work at McDonald's. I am taking a year off before I start college. I am saving money to buy my first car. I live with my parents.

content.text: So, how do you like working at McDonald's?
It's okay, but it's not my dream job.
What's your dream job?
I want to be an engineer.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in engineering.
Me too! I love math and science.
What kind of engineering are you interested in?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about mechanical engineering.
That's a good choice. Mechanical engineers can do a lot of different things.
Yeah, I know. I'm excited to learn more about it.
So, why are you taking a year off before you go to college?
I wanted to save up some money for tuition and books.
That's a good idea. I wish I had done that.
Yeah, it's definitely been worth it.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, hang out with my friends, and play video games.
Me too! I love going to the movies. What's your favorite movie?
I don't know if I have a favorite movie, but I really like the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
Me too! That's a great series. I'm excited for the new one.
Me too! I'm hoping it's good.
Me too! I think it will be.
